title: How did you get your first pentakill ?
body:
And how did you react?

I played connect the dots by myself with {{champion:5}}  on ARAM for a quad but had to get help from {{champion:39}}  and {{champion:105}} with {{champion:19}} .

replies.body:
Twitch,spray n pray

I was pretty chuffed
spray n pray lmao xD
ive also had pentakills on pre rework {{champion:82}}  and {{champion:30}} .. good times
Back in the day Varus' attack speed passive on champion kills was all the rage.

With a tanky jungle Bard after stealing Baron!

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/V3toE2gA-bard-pentakill
Karthus on ARAM, without using ult!
Jax on their nexus :)
Feral Flare Yi.

Kalista release day, built a runaans huricane on her, decided to fight the enemy team in their own base.

Wasnt as exciting as i thought itd be.
I have never had
Haven't gotten mine yet. Mostly because I usually play support. The closest I got was a triple kill with {{champion:40}}
Howd you get a triple with {{champion:40}}

> [{quoted}](name=Jencarna,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=xY15Jf0o,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-03-26T11:06:21.185+0000)
>
> Howd you get a triple with {{champion:40}}

Man, I don't even know. I was just trying to peel. Too many tornadoes I guess!
Master Yi on Beginner's Bots...
tbh I can't remember my normal or aram pentas, but My first (and only) ranked penta was with Darius with 5 dunks for 5 kills
I...I...I still haven't gotten a penta...{{item:3070}}
my first penta was with {{champion:267}} a lot of ks lol

I was half graphics (literally half of yi, split down the middle was just grey, no colour at all) Yi in ARAM.
But my first 5v5 was with AP Ezreal (the shaco gave me the chance to get a penta after i got the quadra)

and i was pretty damn happy for the 5v5 one, but less so for the first, because i was playing yi.
got a quadra kill from a team fight as{{champion:222}} then a friend tanked a tower for me to flash in a grab the last C:
Xerath pre rework in a rank game back when i was silver lol

Split Push Fed Jax in a ranked 5's killed 2 guys 2v1 as my team pushed nexus and got the last 3 in a teamfight.

Was happy to finally get one in ranked since my only other Penta at that time was in a bot game LOL

Honeslty didn't feel AS good as it could have because the last guy kinda stood there and let me get the Penta.
